Function.Description: Scale Actor
Function.Args: A0 - global context | A1 - float value

Function.Description: Generates a random number between 0 inclusive and 1 exclusive
Generates random s16 number
Function.Args: A0 = s16 Offset | A1 = s16 Range | V0 = s16 Result
Function.Description2: Generates random integer between 0 and range (exlusive), and adds Offset

Function.Description: Spawn Particle 0x0E
smoothly aproximates a0 to a1, commonly used for smooth movement
Function.Args: a0 - actor instance + xxxx (offset of the float that will change) | a1 - float where you want a0 to be aproximated to | a2 - float (amount?)a3 - float (smaller than a2)

Function.Description: Multiply Float Matrix Stack's top matrix by float Vector3
Function.Args: A0 = ptr to Vector3 | A1 = ptr to result

Function.Description: Draws circular shadow until instance is destroyed (use in constructor)
Function.Args: a0 - actor instance + 0xB4 | a1 - float unknown (will be stored at a0 + 0x08) | a2 - 800B5BA0 (draw function of shadow, will be stored at a0 + 0x0C) | a3 - float unknown (will be stored at a0 + 0x10)

Function.Description: Initializes hitbox structure (different purpose than ???)
Function.Args: a0 - global context | a1 - actor instance + 0x0150 (offset of hitbox struct in the instance)

Function.Description: Loads hitbox variable array to hitbox structure (different purpose than ???)
Function.Args: a0 - global context | a1 - actor instance + 0x0150 (offset of hitbox struct in the instance) | a2 - actor instance | a3 - hitbox variable array

Function.Description: retrieves damage chart table pointer, called by all actors that doesn't have their damage chart inside overlay
Function.Args: a0 - entry ID of some table? varies between actors | v0 - returns pointer that's used in a1 of damage chart initializer (800E90CC)

Function.Description: initializes damage chart part of actor
Unloads hitbox structure (different purpose than ???)
Function.Args: a0 - global context | a1 - actor instance + 0x0150 (offset where you stored the hitbox struct)

Function.Description: Subscribe to collision pool 2, non-complex poly types | //Called directly by actors
Function.Args: A0 = Global Context | A1 = //collision body groups | A2 = Collision Body Ptr | V0 = 0 or -1 based on ??? lowest bit?

Function.Description: Subscribe to collision pool 3, non-complex poly types
Function.Args: A0 = Global Context | A1 = //collision body groups | A2 = Collision Body Ptr | V0 = 0 or -1 based on ??? lowest bit? | Called directly by actors

Function.Description: plays sound at position
Function.Args: a0 - global context | a1 - actor instance + 0x24 (position array of the sound) | a2 - 0x3C (radius?) | a3 - sound ID

Function.Description: Kill Actor (nulls draw/update, but does not deallocate)
Physics, updates XYZ coordinates of actor
possibly primary actor collision call
Function.Args: A0 = Global Context | A1 = Actor Instance | A2 = float wallCheckHeight? (26f for Link) | A3 = float wallPushback? (18f/14f for Adult/Child Link) | SP+0x10 float ? (56f/40f for Adult/Child Link) | SP+0x14 int (type?)

Function.Description: Sets the actor height (used by navi, target arrows, camera face when an npc is talking, etc)
Function.Args: a0 - actor instance | a1 - float Y position from actor origin

Function.Description: Create/Apply x,y,z scalar transformation on Float Matrix Stack
Function.Args: F12 = x | F14 = y | A2 = float z | A3 = 0 initializes new matrix, 1 transforms stored matrix

Function.Description: Converts and Appends the Float Matrix Stack's top matrix to POLY_OPA_DISP end
